summary.span: Provides helper methods for marshaling data between the .NET Framework and the Windows Runtime.

span.span: Provides helper methods for marshaling data between the .NET Framework and the Windows Runtime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了例外狀況的例外狀況區段中，任何`HRESULT`以外`S_OK`傳回基礎的處理站方法會封送處理為例外狀況。In addition to the exceptions in the Exceptions section, any `HRESULT` other than `S_OK` that is returned by the underlying factory method will be marshaled as an exception.
